title: Majokko Club Yoningumi: A Kuukan kara no Alien X
synopsis: Yuu, Persia, Mai and Yumi are together in a science fiction-like adventure. An awful monster assault young and beautiful girls, leaving them transformed into ugly hags: only our four magical girls with their powers can fly to the space and fight for Earth 's sake, so Yuu transforms into Creamy Mami, Mai into Magical Emi, Persia into Fairy and little Yumi draws space suits for all of them.
related_anime: ['Mahou no Idol Pastel Yumi', 'Mahou no Yousei Persia', 'Mahou no Star Magical Emi', 'Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami: Perfect Memory', 'Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami']
staff: [['Tominaga, Tsuneo', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Tomita, Sukehiro', ['Script']], ['Takagi, Hiroki', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
